Rejoignez notre réseau et bénéficiez de: Join our network and benefit from many opportunities.
Le Réseau Ivoirien des Diplômés de la Di: The Ivorian Network of Diaspora Graduates (RIDD) is an organization born on November 15, 2017 at the initiative of young Ivorian graduates from the diaspora. Its aim is to contribute to creating a framework conducive to the return of graduates from the Ivorian diaspora, to promote Ivorian students trained abroad and to promote young entrepreneurship on national and international territory.
Notre ADN, notre raison d'être et les ob: Our objectives to be achieved are summed up in
Contribuer à créer un cadre propice au r: Contribute to creating a framework conducive to the return of graduates from the Ivorian diaspora
Promouvoir l’entreprenariat jeune sur le: Promote young entrepreneurship on the national and international territory
Nos valeurs sont les principes fondament: Our values ​​are the fundamental principles that govern our approach to work and the conditions of collaboration.
La durée du contrat est requis: The duration of the contract is required
Le détails sur le profil recherché est r: The details of the profile sought is required
L'addresse géographique de l'entreprise: The geographical address of the company is required
Veuillez accepter les conditions général: Please accept the terms of use
Nous constatons que ce compte n'est pas: We see that this account is not authorized to use this link
Le RIDD (Réseau Ivoirien des Diplômés de: The RIDD (Ivorian Network of Graduates of the Diaspora) is positioned as an incentive platform which sets itself the objective of offering this Ivorian « intelligencia » all the opportunities available in order to succeed in their socio-professional integration in Côte-d'Ivoire. . It is within this framework that one of the flagship events of the RIDD takes place: the Ivorian Student Diaspora Awards. It is an open window to celebrate excellence, distinguish the best students trained outside, exhibit the formidable potential of the human resources of the diaspora with companies, and provide graduates from the diaspora with real opportunities for integration into the socio-economic fabric.
Faire la promotion des étudiants et dipl: Promote Ivorian students and graduates in order to encourage them to come and put their skills at the service of the economic development of Côte D'Ivoire.
Contribuer à la promotion des talents de: Contribute to the promotion of the talents of the diaspora through the culture of merit, expose the potential of the human resources of the diaspora, encourage the entrepreneurship of young people in the diaspora and at the local level, guide students at the local level in their project of study abroad, build a professional network facilitating contact between recruiters and job seekers through the channel of the RIDD web portal.
Étudiants et diplômés de la diaspora ivo: Students and graduates from the Ivorian diaspora, local students wishing to study abroad, project leaders from the diaspora and at the local level, companies, recruitment firms, incubators, government agencies, international organizations.
Présentation du portail web du RIDD: Presentation of the RIDD web portal
Visite stand des universités étrangères: Stand visit of foreign universities and companies
Atelier de formation et Soirée de distin: Training Workshop and Evening of Distinction
Campagne de sensibilisation contre la fu: Awareness campaign against the brain drain in schools and universities
Dans la continuité des efforts faits par: In line with the efforts made by bodies, organizations and institutions in the fight against illegal migration and the brain drain in Côte d'Ivoire, the RIDD has decided to make its contribution through an event. It will consist of criss-crossing cities and schools to urge pupils, students, young graduates and non-graduates, to create wealth to build the country, and by taking advantage of the opportunities to be seized on the spot and to become aware of the dangers linked to migration irregular.
Eclairer la lanterne de la jeunesse ivoi: Shed light on the Ivorian youth on the existing opportunities in Côte d'Ivoire, Urge the youth to reflect on investment opportunities in still untapped sectors of activity linked to the country's resources, Encourage the State of Côte d'Ivoire Ivoire to invest in the development of human capital and socio-professional integration
Jeunes ivoiriens, élèves et étudiants iv: Young Ivorians, pupils and Ivorian students (graduates or not)
Débats et présentation de programmes de: Debates and presentation of scholarship programs and leisure
La Journée d’Information et d’Orientatio: The International Mobility Information and Orientation Day (JIOMI) is a university mobility program that is part of the decentralized cooperation of the eastern regions of Morocco and the Ivorian regions through the granting scholarships. The winners selected for this program benefit from support from the two partner regions.
Dépasser l'appréhension du départ à l'ét: Overcome the apprehension of going abroad and inform students about the possibilities of studying abroad, particularly in Morocco
Inciter les étudiants à passer le cap d': Encourage students to take the step of international mobility, Express and dispel doubts concerning studies abroad (validation of the year abroad, terms, formalities to be observed, financial aid as well as the cost that this may incur for them)
Les élèves et étudiants (diplômés ou non: Ivorian pupils and students (graduates or not), parents
Cadre d'expression dédié aux Ambassades: Expression framework dedicated to Embassies and institutions in order to publicize scholarship programs or opportunities for young people .
Informer la jeunesse estudiantine sur le: Informing young students about opportunities (foreign scholarships, academic and professional programs)
Communiquer sur la procédure de reconnai: Communicate on the procedure for the recognition of foreign diplomas, Inform on the means of verification of accreditation of universities of foreign universities
Les élèves et étudiants ivoiriens, les a: Ivorian pupils and students, embassies, institutions, schools and universities
Cette journée s’inscrit dans les axes d’: This day is in line with the areas of intervention of the RIDD and aims to contribute to informing, guiding and raising the awareness of young students on mechanisms related to the process of studying abroad, the choice of future sectors, the integration policy in the country and better career planning.
Mettre à la disposition des étudiants et: Provide Ivorian students and graduates with information on the best strategy to adopt for a successful academic orientation.
Fournir au public cible, les information: Provide the target audience with information on the conditions and procedures for entering a foreign school or university; Inform, guide and raise awareness among young students on mechanisms related to the process of studying abroad, the choice of future sectors, the policy of integration in the country and better professional career planning
Étudiants et diplômés ivoiriens, écoles: Ivorian students and graduates, schools and universities locally and internationally
Présentation des écoles et universités é: Presentation of foreign schools and universities
Le projet « CAFE DU RIDD » s’inscrit dan: The « CAFE DU RIDD » project is part of the capacity building of its members at the national and international level and the project leaders. Indeed, the RIDD being a non-governmental organization; it aims to participate in transmitting, guiding, orienting and helping anyone wishing to pursue studies, create a framework for brain return and promote Ivorians abroad. This platform represented by the RIDD coffee, allows its members to acquire knowledge and deepen their skills to begin their empowerment and be equipped to face the challenges that arise at the level of Ivorian youth. Good training makes you more competitive, hence the need for members of the network to acquire adequate techniques to participate in the development of the country.
Le concept du « Café du RIDD » a pour mi: The concept of the « Café du RIDD » has as its primary mission the capacity building of its target.
Etoffer les capacités et compétences des: Expand the capacities and skills of members through training, Provide the same training opportunities to our various members, project leaders and Ivorian youth, Provide practical and financial assistance through our partners to network project leaders
Les cibles directes : membres du bureau: Direct targets: members of the RIDD national office, international coordination and network project leaders; The final target: Ivorian youth
Étendre nos mains de soutien à offrir de: Extend our hands of support to offer food and non-food donations to our communities.
Porter assistance et communiquer de l'am: Provide assistance and communicate love to others. The RIDD is also a family with a sense of sharing and love.
Prisonniers et des personnes en conditio: Prisoners and people in precarious living conditions.
J’ai lu et accepte les conditions généra: I have read and accept the general conditions of use
Un nouveau lien de vérification a été en: A new verification link has been sent to the email address you provided during registration.
Merci pour votre inscription! Avant de c: Thank you for your registration! Before we begin, could you verify your email address by clicking on the link we just emailed to you? If you did not receive the email, we will send you another one with pleasure.

Promouvoir l'entreprenariat jeune sur le: Promote youth entrepreneurship on the national and international territory
Annonces en tête de liste: Ads at the top of the list
